name: 2nd International Summit on 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing
content: It is our pleasure to invite all scientists, academicians, young researchers, business delegates, and students from all over the world to attend the 2nd International Summit on 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing will be held on August 26-28, 2024 in Valencia, Spain. The main objective of the meeting is to promote contact between scientists working in 3D Printing and Additive Manufacturing, in order to share experiences, to spread the latest information on progress in their specialties and related fields, to gain visibility for their research, to put young researchers interacting with their peers and seniors, and to develop professionally.
